src:
The 90's Festival, Ajang Nostalgia Generasi Jadul Rasa Milenial
07 Nov 2019, 01:55 by Agus Wijananto


The 90's Festival, Ajang Nostalgia Generasi Jadul Rasa Milenial

KBRN, Jakarta : Sejumlah musisi Era 90-an yang terdiri dari 34 musisi Indonesia dan 4 musisi internasional akan reuni dan meramaikan festival nostalgia terbesar di Indonesia "The 90's Festival edisi ke-5,  yang akan berlangsung pada 23-24 November 2019 di Gambir Expo Kompleks JIEXPO, Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat.
Sederet musisi internasional yang ngetop di era 90 an seperti Hanson, Aqua, Michael Learns To Rock, dan Vertical Horizon dipastikan hadir menghibur penggemarnya di Indonesia.
"Empat musisi ini merupakan permintaan dari para penikmat musik 90-an. Puji Tuhan kami bisa menghadirkan mereka di The 90's Festival edisi ke-5 ini. Bagi Hanson dan Aqua, ini merupakan pertama kalinya mereka ke Indonesia," kata Promotor The 90's Festival dari Akselerasi Entertainment, Arinda Mentari Putri, dalam jumpa pers di Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Sedangkan untuk musisi dalam negeri yang akan menjadi line-up diantaranya Kla Project, God Bless, Jamrud, Potret, P-Project, Powerslaves, Sheila On 7, GIGI, Tipe-X, Tofu, Iwa K, Faris RM, Vina Panduwinata dan masih banyak yang lainnya.
"Tahun ini kami berhasil mengumpulkan sederet musisi tahun 90-an yang sudah lama vakum di industri musik Indonesia dan tentunya bukan hal mudah bagi kami untuk mengajak mereka kembali reuni di panggung The 90's Festival," ungkap Arindra.
Menurut dia, tak mudah untuk menggandeng para musisi yang tenar di era 90 an untuk kembali manggung di ajang ini.  Selain sudah lama vakum dari industri musik Tanah Air, sebagian besar bintang tamu juga sudah lama menghilang dari peredaran, sudah punya kesibukan masing-masing, bahkan tak lagi memiliki manajer.
"Kesulitannya untuk reuni artis tahun 90-an ini adalah ternyata mereka sudah banyak yang tidak bermanajer, sehingga untuk menghubungi mereka itu langsung ke personelnya, lewat DM (direct message) itu salah satunya," sambung Arinda.
Nostalgia Rasa Milenial
Salah satu grup lawas yang akan tampil adalah Tofu. Anto, salah satu personelnya menjelaskan, bahwa penampilan ini menjadi pertama kalinya bagi Tofu dalam bernostalgia setelah 12 hingga 13 tahun berpisah. "Terakhir manggung formasi lama 2003. Ini pertama kali formasi lama berempat setelah hampir 12-13 tahun,” katanya.
Personil Tofu lainnya, Fla menambahkan, nantinya Tofu akan mengajak Uya Kuya yang merupakan bagian dari formasi awal untuk reuni di festival ini. "Bukan hanya Uya saja, tapi akan ada juga Joenifar Arief yang merupakan pengganti posisi Uya dari tahun 2003-2006," jelas Fla.
Sementara itu, salah satu Diva Indonesia, Vina Panduwinata menyatakan akan tampil membawakan sejumlah lagunya yang pernah hits, tapi diaransemen ulang agar bisa dinikmati oleh generasi saat ini.Bersama drummer Ikmal Tobing, Vina akan menyajikan lagunya dengan aransemen kekinian.
"Lagunya Mama Ina (Vina Panduwinata) yang lama dibikin konsep yang berbeda supaya kalau bisa aransemen berbeda supaya bisa merangkul yang muda. Mama Ina punya cucu, mereka bilang sekarang Mama Ina keren banget kalau nyanyi," kata Vina.
Vina Panduwinata juga akan berkolaborasi dengan Close Friends, grup musik yang juga melibatkan Ikmal Tobing dan DJ Goeslann. Beberapa lagu Vina diaransemen lebih modern. "Konsepnya lebih milenial, musik kekinian, lebih elektronik pop. Karena juga di sini kita merombak lagu Mama Ina," kata Ikmal.
Ada Zona 90-an
Selain menampilkan 34 musisi lokal dan internasional yang akan unjuk gigi di empat panggung, ajang nostalgia terbesar di Indonesia ini juga akan disemarakkan dengan hadirnya 90's Zone dan 90's Games.
90's Zone merupakan area di mana pengunjung bisa melihat atau membeli barang-barang jadul dan antik tahun 90-an yang dipamerkan oleh komunitas-komunitas yang bekerjasama dengan The 90's Festival. Sedangkan 90's games merupakan area bermain game retro yang sempat tenar pada masanya seperti Arcade atau Ding Dong, dan juga konsol jadul.
text:
The 90's Festival, Millennial Nostalgia Generation Event
Nov 7 2019, 01:55 by Agus Wijananto


The 90's Festival, Millennial Nostalgia Generation Event

KBRN, Jakarta: A number of 90s musicians consisting of 34 Indonesian musicians and 4 international musicians will reunite and enliven the biggest nostalgia festival in Indonesia "The 90's Festival 5th edition, which will take place on 23-24 November 2019 at Gambir Expo Kompleks JIEXPO, Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat.
A series of well-known international musicians in the 90s, such as Hanson, Aqua, Michael Learns To Rock, and Vertical Horizon, were sure to be entertaining their fans in Indonesia.
"These four musicians are requests from music connoisseurs of the 90s. Praise God we were able to present them at The 90's Festival 5th edition. For Hanson and Aqua, this is their first time to Indonesia," said The 90's Festival Promoter of Acceleration of Entertainment, Arinda Mentari Putri, at a press conference in Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
As for domestic musicians who will be a line-up including Kla Project, God Bless, Jamrud, Portraiture, P-Project, Powerslaves, Sheila On 7, DENTAL, Type-X, Tofu, Iwa K, Faris RM, Vina Panduwinata and still many others.
"This year we managed to gather a series of 90s musicians who have long been vacuum in the Indonesian music industry and of course it is not easy for us to invite them to reunite on the stage of The 90's Festival," said Arindra.
According to him, it is not easy to hold famous musicians in the 90s to return to the stage at this event. In addition to being a vacuum from the music industry in the country, most of the guest stars have also long disappeared from circulation, already have their own activities, and no longer even have a manager.
"The difficulty for the artist's reunion in the 90s is that there are already many who are not managers, so to contact them directly to their personnel, via DM (direct message) is one of them," continued Arinda.
Nostalgia for Millennial Sense
One of the older groups that will be performing is Tofu. Anto, one of the personnel explained, that this appearance was the first time for Tofu to reminisce after 12 to 13 years of separation. "The last gig was the old formation of 2003. This is the first time the old formation took place after almost 12-13 years," he said.
Other Tofu personnel, Fla added, later Tofu would invite Uya Kuya who was part of the initial formation for a reunion at this festival. "Not only Uya, but there will also be Joenifar Arief who is a substitute for Uya's position from 2003-2006," said Fla.
Meanwhile, one of Diva Indonesia, Vina Panduwinata said that she would perform a number of songs that had hits, but they were re-arranged so that they could be enjoyed by the current generation. Together with drummer Ikmal Tobing, Vina will present the song with contemporary arrangements.
"The old song Mama Ina (Vina Panduwinata) has made a different concept so that if possible different arrangements to embrace the young. Mama Ina has grandchildren, they say now Mama Ina is really cool when singing," said Vina.
Vina Panduwinata will also collaborate with Close Friends, a music group that also involves Ikmal Tobing and DJ Goeslann. Some of Vina's songs are more modern arrangements. "The concept is more millennial, contemporary music, more electronic pop. Because also here we are overhauling the song Mama Ina," said Ikmal.
There is a Zone of the 90s
Besides performing 34 local and international musicians who will show off on four stages, the biggest nostalgia event in Indonesia will also be enlivened by the presence of 90's Zone and 90's Games.
90's Zone is an area where visitors can see or buy old-fashioned and antique goods of the 90s that are exhibited by communities that collaborate with The 90's Festival. Whereas 90's games is a retro gaming area that was famous in its time such as Arcade or Ding Dong, and also old school consoles.
